E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/26/1977
Subject: Progress of Ron G. Davis
Dear Sir,
Ron G. Davis is doing pretty good at A Fort Lauderdale Yankees!
He has an ERA of 3.03, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/27/1977
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Ron Klimkowski
